About me

Me, Development and Design

Hi, I am Akbar, a full stack web developer and designer from Seoul, South Korea. I love making dynamic apps for the web and messing with new technologies.
From technical standpoint, I mainly use Javascript and Python for development and HTML5 and CSS3 for design ( obviously :) ).
For the past two years I have worked with wide range of development tools and frameworks. I mosty make use of Django, React, Express JS and BootStrap.
New open source technologies are super exiciting to me. Recently, I started learning blockchain and I should say I am pretty impressed by the idea behind it.
If you also like discussing about technology, get in touch on Twitter.
